name: QuizCards: Flashcard Maker for Study and Quiz
description: Create flashcards with the Quiz Cards flashcard maker to study or quiz any topic. Designed to help you learn a new language, study vocabulary or prepare for tests.  Features:  + Light-weight and easy to use flashcard maker + 100% Ad free + Create, study and quiz 100% offline + Create flashcards on computer and download to device + Export & import flashcards to your device + Backup your flashcards to the cloud and download them to any device + Share your flashcards with friends anywhere around the world + Text-to-Speech support for over 10 languages + Study with standard flashcards or test yourself with flashcard quizzes + Multiple choice or Type-in answer quiz modes + Create flashcards with photos or text + Backup, Share & Download cards with images + Create flash cards with audio clips + Quiz timer setting to quiz under time limit  * Some features above require a Quiz Cards account which can be created in the App, and require an internet connection.  To create flashcards on your computer, go to www.quizcardsapp.com * Note: You will need a QuizCards account - which can be created in the App.  Features coming soon:  - Import flashcard sets from excel and other apps  Looking for a specific feature? Click the Feedback tab in the app to provide feedback or email me at quizcardsapps@gmail.com  Keywords: flashcard creator, flashcard maker, flashcard maker with images, flashcards, quiz cards, study cards, studying, quizzes, learn new language, study vocabulary, vocabulary, new language, study languages
